amendatorysection.para: If any person shall knowingly, willfully, and maliciously demolish, cut down or destroy any private, public or toll bridge, cut, fell, deface, alter, remove or destroy any landmark, corner or bearing tree, witness trench and pits or witness pits, properly established, the person so offending shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

crossreference.para: Damaging or obstructing bridge, penalties, see sections 39-303 and 39-304.
